mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SPECIAL FEATURES "There's No Time To Rest When You're On The Road", "One Square Dance Dress", "Vox Saltator - Voice of the Dancer", "Round Dance Teaching and the Clock", "Americana: The Girl I Left Behind Me", "Thirty-four Thousand Dancers", and "Homes for Square Dancing". This edition also includes the the regular features entitled "Square Dance Date Book", "From the Floor", "As I See It", "Style Series: Sally Goodin' - Two Varieties", "'Round the Outside Ring", "Caller of the Month: Max Forsyth", "Style Series: Adjusting to New Lines of Four", "Ladies on the Square: Get Your Hooks Out, Girls", "Paging the Roundancers: Van and Audrey Van Sickle", and "On the Record".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
